Package org.ginsim.common.utils

Class FileFormatDescription

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ginsim.common.utils.FileFormatDescription
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GenericDocumentFormat
    public class FileFormatDescription
extends Object
    Simple description of a file format. Each format has an identifier and an extension. A list of defined format is automatically maintained and can be used to retrieve a format by ID or by extension. "Groups" of related formats can also be created by subclassing (the class will be used as group identifier).
    Author:
    Aurelien Naldi
